com.here.sdk.mapviewlite

Class MapScene

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.NativeBase
      • com.here.sdk.mapviewlite.MapScene

  • public final class MapScene
extends NativeBase

    Represents a map scene and exposes the functionality to manipulate its content.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  MapScene.ErrorCode
      Represents various errors that could occur as a result of operations on the MapScene.
      static interface  MapScene.LoadSceneCallback
      This method will be called on the main thread when loading a scene has been completed.
      static class  MapScene.MapSceneException

      • loadScene

        public void loadScene(@NonNull
                      MapStyle mapStyle,
                      @Nullable
                      MapScene.LoadSceneCallback callback)

        Asynchronously loads a map scene described by the specified map style using a default MapSceneConfig. Any previous map scene config will be overwritten.

        Note: The callback is called on the main thread. Calling this again before completion may result in a MapScene.ErrorCode.

        Parameters:
        mapStyle -

        Map style.

        callback -

        Optional callback that will receive the result of this operation.

      • loadScene

        public void loadScene(@NonNull
                      java.lang.String pathToMapStyle,
                      @Nullable
                      MapScene.LoadSceneCallback callback)

        Asynchronously loads a map scene described by the specified map style using a default MapSceneConfig. Any previous map scene config will be overwritten.

        Note: The callback is called on the main thread. Calling this again before completion may result in a MapScene.ErrorCode.

        Parameters:
        pathToMapStyle -

        A full path to a YAML file describing a style. Place the style into the "assets" directory. You can precede the path with "asset:///", but it's not required. If you want to use another location on your device that you have an access to, you should use "file://" scheme and append an absolute path to the style.

        callback -

        Optional callback that will receive the result of this operation.

      • loadScene

        public void loadScene(@NonNull
                      MapStyle mapStyle,
                      @NonNull
                      MapSceneConfig sceneConfig,
                      @Nullable
                      MapScene.LoadSceneCallback callback)

        Asynchronously loads a map scene described by the specified map style and map scene config.

        Note: The callback is called on the main thread. Calling this again before completion may result in a MapScene.ErrorCode.

        Parameters:
        mapStyle -

        Map style.

        sceneConfig -

        MapSceneConfig instance that contains the properties of the scene.

        callback -

        Optional callback that will receive the result of this operation.

      • loadScene

        public void loadScene(@NonNull
                      java.lang.String pathToMapStyle,
                      @NonNull
                      MapSceneConfig sceneConfig,
                      @Nullable
                      MapScene.LoadSceneCallback callback)

        Asynchronously loads a map scene described by the specified map style and map scene config.

        Note: The callback is called on the main thread. Calling this again before completion may result in a MapScene.ErrorCode.

        Parameters:
        pathToMapStyle -

        A full path to a YAML file describing a style. Place the style into the "assets" directory. You can precede the path with "asset:///", but it's not required. If you want to use another location on your device that you have an access to, you should use "file://" scheme and append an absolute path to the style.

        sceneConfig -

        MapSceneConfig instance that contains the properties of the scene.

        callback -

        Optional callback that will receive the result of this operation.

      • addMapMarker

        public void addMapMarker(@NonNull
                         MapMarker mapMarker)

        Adds a map marker to this map scene. Adding the same marker instance multiple times has no effect.

        Parameters:
        mapMarker -

        The map marker to be added to this map scene.

      • removeMapMarker

        public void removeMapMarker(@NonNull
                            MapMarker mapMarker)

        Removes a map marker from this map scene. Removing a marker instance that is not on this scene has no effect.

        Parameters:
        mapMarker -

        The map marker to be removed from this map scene.

      • setLayerState

        public void setLayerState(@NonNull
                          MapLayer layer,
                          @NonNull
                          LayerState newState)
                   throws MapScene.MapSceneException

        Immediately changes the state of a map layer on a bundled map style. Enables or disables the map layer specified.

        Note: Requires a loaded scene. Calling this during a load scene operation may fail. For more details please look at MapScene.ErrorCode.

        Parameters:
        layer -

        The map layer to be changed.

        newState -

        The new state of the layer.

        Throws:
        MapScene.MapSceneException

      • setLayerState

        public void setLayerState(@NonNull
                          java.lang.String layerName,
                          @NonNull
                          LayerState newState)
                   throws MapScene.MapSceneException

        Immediately changes the state of a specified map layer on a custom map style. Enables or disables the map layer specified.

        Note: Requires a loaded scene. Calling this during a load scene operation or with an unknown layer may fail. For more details please look at MapScene.ErrorCode.

        Parameters:
        layerName -

        The name of the map layer to be changed.

        newState -

        The new state of the layer.

        Throws:
        MapScene.MapSceneException
